org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.protocol.datatransfer.sasl

Class SaslParticipant

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.protocol.datatransfer.sasl.SaslParticipant

  • @InterfaceAudience.Private
 class SaslParticipant
extends Object
    Strongly inspired by Thrift's TSaslTransport class. Used to abstract over the SaslServer and SaslClient classes, which share a lot of their interface, but unfortunately don't share a common superclass.
